document.full_text: light rain loosened the grip of a devastating u.s. drought, but the moisture was missing or was too late for charred pastures and dried out wheat fields through the u.s. southwest and plains states.
document.title: drought eases with rains, but drought still dire
lines_and_colors: light rain loosened the grip of a devastating u.s. drought, but the moisture was missing or was too late for charred pastures and dried out wheat fields through the u.s. southwest and plains states.
